body: Do you have a taste for software quality? Would you like to grow as a leader? If so, there is a unique opportunity - read on!Consumer Website (CW) is a kaleidoscope of startups developing a wide variety of core technologies (rendering, traffic and content optimization, machine learning) that power Amazon.com, the website used by millions of consumers around the globe. This is where Amazon began, and this is where our fun, dynamic culture originates from.The QA team inside CW is uniquely exposed to the entire breadth of CW technologies - we partner with other feature teams to solve Amazon’s biggest challenges in the area of software quality. This provides our engineers plenty of opportunities to enhance and broaden their industry experience.We created a unique role called “Lead SDET” that focuses on leadership and impact. Seriously, who wants to stay in one team tweaking the same test cases for years? Instead you will engage different development teams to identify and solve their top quality problems. You will partner with managers to direct and prioritize testing efforts. You will enable developers to write tests by creating frameworks, tools and samples. You will make technical contributions to “lead by example” and educate teams on QA fundamentals. You will move on to something new as soon as the culture of quality is ingrained, and the team is ready to follow your footsteps and build on your legacy.The role is highly technical, so we are looking for someone with strong analytical skills and a proven track record of developing production-quality code as well as test automation.• Computer Science or similar degree• Computer Science fundamentals in data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis• Strong object-oriented design and coding skills in Java (or equivalent languages such as C++/C#)• Expert in software quality and test methodologies• At least 2 years of software testing experience and building test automation, ideally for distributed systems in a complex, multi-tiered environment• Knowledge of industry standard test automation tools• Comfortable working in a fast paced, highly collaborative, dynamic work environment• Advanced level of written and spoken English
title: Software Dev Engineer,  Test
locations: Str. Palat 3E, Iași, Județul Iași, România
